thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 31 of 227
thread.title: Jean

author: Jean
title: Jean
text: The men were on time, worked quickly and efficiently and made sure I was satisfied with everything. They explained to me why they took pictures of what was delivered and of course I signed my name to the documents of which I had no problem doing. Also, Gardner White prices are reasonable and they have good sales and the people who work there are polite and not pushy. If I ever need any more furniture I will definitely come back to Gardner White and recommend the store to others. Sincerely, Jean
